subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Garrett Atkins went 3 for 5 with a grand slam and Josh Beckett lost for the first time this season as the Colorado Rockies defeated the host Boston Red Sox, 7-1, last night.
snippet: Garrett Atkins went 3 for 5 with a grand slam and Josh Beckett lost for the first time this season as the Colorado Rockies defeated the host Boston Red Sox, 7-1, last night.
